actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution calling for the President to promote negotiations for a Comprehensive Test Ban Treaty ending all nuclear explosions.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the House of Representatives that the President of the United States (1) should propose an immediate suspension of underground nuclear explosions to remain in effect so long as the Soviet Union abstains from conducting underground explosions, and (2) should set forth promptly a new proposal to the Government of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics and other nations for a permanent treaty to ban all nuclear explosions.

titles.title: Resolution calling for the President to promote negotiations for a Comprehensive Test Ban Treaty ending all nuclear explosions.
